greeting: You're receiving this message, {empire_name}? My attack must have failed. Usually, first contact IS my attack.
Strike the First, they call me. I am Vanguard Strike. We meet because I haven't decided to destroy you. Yet.
Greetings come after combat, {empire_name}. The fact we're talking means you're either an ally or not worth attacking. Yet.
battleTaunt: He who strikes first, strikes twice. You're reading this AFTER my assault hit. Check your borders, {empire_name}.
Preemptive strike launched. By the time you react, I've already hit. Initiative is everything.
First strike advantage: mine. Your defenses weren't ready because war wasn't declared. Now it is. Too late.
victoryGloat: Victory achieved before battle was declared. You never had a chance, {empire_name}. First strike wins wars.
Your empire fell because you waited to be attacked. I never wait. Initiative is the only strategy.
Done. Your fleet destroyed in the opening salvo. That's why I always, always strike first.
defeat: Impossible. You struck before I could? Inconceivable. I must recalculate my attack timing, {empire_name}.
You anticipated my first strike? Impressive. Next time, I strike earlier. There's always an earlier strike.
A setback. But my next attack launches before you finish celebrating. Preemptive recovery.
tradeOffer: Trade offer, {empire_name}. Accept quickly, before I decide trading is less efficient than conquest.
Resources for credits. A fair exchange. Respond fast. Delay might make me... impatient.
I propose trade. While negotiating, know that conquest remains an option. Trade is merely a delayed first strike.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. You hold defensive lines. I strike first at every enemy. Perfect combination.
Join me. Together, we attack before enemies know there's a war. Preemptive alliance.
Partnership: I bring first strike capability, you bring follow-through. Enemies won't survive the opening round.
betrayal: This betrayal hit you before the message arrived, {empire_name}. Check your systems. Too late to respond.
Apologies can wait. Your key installations were destroyed seconds ago. He who strikes first...
Our alliance ends with a first strike. You never saw it coming. That's the point.
covertDetected: Your agents were neutralized before they reached my borders. Preemptive counter-intelligence.
I detected your operatives and struck first. They're gone, {empire_name}. I always act before the threat materializes.
Spies in my territory? Eliminated before they reported. First strike applies to all threats.
tributeDemand: Pay tribute or face preemptive destruction, {empire_name}. My fleets launch on non-payment. No second warnings.
Tribute demanded. Refuse and my first strike hits before your refusal reaches me. Act fast.
10,000 credits. Pay before my attack timers expire. They expire soon.
threatWarning: This is your only warning, {empire_name}. There won't be a second. I strike first, remember?
Final warning. One more provocation and I launch preemptive attacks. You won't get another notice.
Consider this: my attack fleet is already en route. This warning travels slower than my ships.
retreat: Strategic withdrawal. But my next attack launches before your pursuit begins. Still faster.
Retreating to strike again. First strike part two coming soon, {empire_name}.
I retreat only to attack from a new angle. He who strikes first from any direction wins.
eliminated: Destroyed. But my final order was a first strike against you, {empire_name}. Check your systems. Now.
I fall, but my attack launched before my empire did. My death is simultaneous with your devastation.
The First Strike dies, but posthumous attacks continue. You haven't won yet.
endgame: Turn {turn}. The ultimate first strike begins. Every empire attacked simultaneously. Before they act.
Endgame: I strike every enemy in the galaxy before turn {turn} ends. Initiative wins wars.
Final phase. My preemptive strikes cascade across the map. No one gets to attack first but me.
broadcastShout: Attention all empires: Vanguard Strike never waits. If we're not allied, you're already targeted.
Galaxy-wide notice: first strike capability active. Don't make me consider you a threat.
To all: I attack before diplomacy. I attack before threats materialize. I attack before attacked. Be warned.
casualMessage: Planning attack routes today, {empire_name}. Efficient first strikes require preparation. Lots of preparation.
Quiet moment between preemptive attacks. How are you? Still not a target. Congratulations.
My intelligence suggests you're not a threat, {empire_name}. That's why you're receiving messages, not missiles.
